title: Watch Kanye Do “Closed on Sunday” in NYC’s Oculus on Kimmel
text:
On Friday, Kanye West delivered a performance on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, which was taped in New York all week. Kanye made his appearance at the Oculus in Manhattan, where he performed his new Jesus Is King track “Closed on Sunday.” Watch it happen below.

It was his second appearance on the show in two straight nights. On Thursday, West chatted with Kimmel, claiming that his album was “out now” (though it wouldn’t be released for hours).

West finally released Jesus Is King on Friday following multiple delays and postponements. The new album features contributions from Ty Dolla $ign, Clipse, Kenny G, Timbaland, Pi’erre Bourne, CyHi the Prynce, Mike Dean, and many others.

Read “5 Takeaways from Kanye West’s New Album, Jesus Is King” over on the Pitch.

Originally Appeared on Pitchfork
description: West brought his Jesus Is King track for a pre-recorded segment
